body_html:
@johnsmithm You should be able to add a dependence on //tensorflow/contrib/mdlstm:mdlstm to what ever target needs it in your new code.

You can format the BUILD file with the buildifier tool. There is a script to install it here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/install/install_buildifier.sh

It might also add the missing dependency for you, but make sure it doesn't make unintended changes to other targets.
